form.text: The following sets forth the pension plan’s funded status, components of pension costs and amounts (in thousands) at the pension plan

The Company provides medical and dental benefits to eligible retirees. Currently, retirees are offered the same benefits as active employees after
taking Medicare into consideration. The following sets forth the other post-retirement benefits’ funded status, components of net periodic benefit
